name: How do i get home?
description:
In this little puzzle game, you will help Mr Snowman reach his flag in each level.
To do so, you will have to split the level apart, and stitch it back together to create a path.

Have fun!

------------------

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music - "Cheery Monday" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
